channel.title: Ranged pking glitch / No DELAY?
channel.description: My server doesn't have delay when someone is fighting with ranged. I've tinkered around a bit, but I absolutely cannot fix it. Can anyone help me with this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2007, 10:03:38 PM[/size][hr]Bump

item.title: Ranged pking glitch / No DELAY?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Moptop, post:5, topic:159593”]One weapon that doesn’t have the delay - dark bows - the code is there, but it still doesn’t delay.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (11785)) //dark bow { UseBow = true; PkingDelay = 8; Wepdelay = 8; createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 80, 249, 60, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 80, 249, 40, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); } [/quote]

I’m not sure whats wrong with yours, but i have the same code, and mines delays. Its probably something that has to do with the new item because maybe it only does it for the old cache items, now since there is newer items, i guess you would have to raise the value, but i wouldn’t know where.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranged pking glitch / No DELAY?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Against Npcs? Go to the method boolean attackNPC() //idk if its with an S.

go to where the specific bow is, and put the wepdelay higher, as well as the other delay, the name escapes me now.
